answers.author: Mark Elder
answers.text:
The City of Wichita has a background policy for developers seeking assistance from the Economic Development Department.  We use Lexis Nexis for a background report of criminal history, bankruptcies, liens and judgements.  We also use internal information to find any delinquent taxes, outstanding fines, building code violations or similar concerns.  Results are written in a report for a review of the character of the applicant to determine the risk involved with the individual/entity.  If you need additional information on our policy, including any supporting documents, you can contact me @ melder@wichita.gov
